name: D.A.S.H
description:
No bullets, only dashes, 4 directions, bump, stomp and throw your enemies.

Each direction gives you an ability:

Left/Right dash destroys enemies and reflects rockets!

Up dash picks up enemies blocking the path and allows you to throw them!

Down dash is a quick attack that destroys everything in your way!

Combine them to create awesome combos and bounce everywhere!

Made for the Ludum Dare 33
